summary: The diff implements frontend-only admin gating for Leads: it adds an isCallerAdmin query hook, hides Leads entry points in the AppShell and LoginPage for non-admins, and adds a non-admin "Not Authorized" state on the Leads page (with navigation support via App.tsx passing onNavigate). Some additional UI (connection loading/error screens and a Share dialog) appears to have been added that was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added global loading and backend connection error screens (with retry and help phone link) in App root.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is specifically about restricting Leads visibility/access for non-admins; it does not request new connection loading/error UX.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a Share dialog/button in the AppShell header (ShareAppLinkCard-based sharing UI).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request share-link UI changes; it focuses on hiding Leads entry points and blocking Leads access for non-admins.
